TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISelectionProvider

summary.span: 公开方法和属性以支持 UI 自动化客户端对控件的访问，这些控件充当用于收集各个可选择的子项的容器。

span.span: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that act as containers for a collection of individual, selectable child items.

summary.span: 此控件的子级必须实现 。

span.span: The children of this control must implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在必须支持 控件模式的 UI 自动化提供程序上实现。Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the control pattern.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanSelectMultiple As Boolean
public: property bool CanSelectMultiple { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定 UI 自动化提供程序是否允许同时选择多个子元素。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider allows more than one child element to be selected concurrently.

value.span: 如果允许多重选择，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if multiple selection is allowed; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以是动态的。This property may be dynamic. 例如，在极少数情况下，控件可能允许在初始化时选择多个项，但随后仅允许进行单项选择。For example, in rare cases a control might allow multiple items to be selected on initialization but subsequently allow only single selections to be made. ## Examples 下面的示例演示此方法对于不允许一次选择多个项的列表的实现。The following example shows an implementation of this method for a list that does not allow selection of more than one item at a time. [!code-csharp[UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip#CanSelectMultiple](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/CSharp/ListFragment.cs#canselectmultiple)] [!code-vb[UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip#CanSelectMultiple](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/visualbasic/listfragment.vb#canselectmultiple)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple[] GetSelection() cil managed

summary.span: 检索所选的每个子元素的 UI 自动化提供程序。

span.span: Retrieves a UI Automation provider for each child element that is selected.

returns.span: UI 自动化提供程序的集合。

span.span: A collection of UI Automation providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当提供程序不提供值时，UIAutoCore 将返回一个默认的空数组。A default empty array is returned by UIAutoCore.dll when the provider doesn't supply a value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了此方法的一个可能的实现，该实现仅支持一个选择。The following example shows one possible implementation of this method for a list box that supports only single selection. [!code-csharp[UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip#GetSelection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/CSharp/ListFragment.cs#getselection)] [!code-vb[UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip#GetSelection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/visualbasic/listfragment.vb#getselection)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSelectionRequired As Boolean
public: property bool IsSelectionRequired { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定 UI 自动化提供程序是否要求至少选择一个子元素。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the UI Automation provider requires at least one child element to be selected.

value.span: 如果必须进行选择，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if selection is required; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以是动态的。This property can be dynamic. 例如，默认情况下，控件的初始状态可能没有选定任何项，这意味着 `false`。For example, the initial state of a control might not have any items selected by default, meaning that is `false`. 但是，选择某一项后，该控件必须始终具有至少一个选定的项。However, after an item is selected, the control must always have at least one item selected. ## Examples 下面的示例演示此方法对于需要始终选择项的列表的实现。The following example shows an implementation of this method for a list that requires an item to be selected at all times. [!code-csharp[UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip#IsSelectionRequired](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/CSharp/ListFragment.cs#isselectionrequired)] [!code-vb[UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip#IsSelectionRequired](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAISelectionProvider_ISelectionItemProvider_snip/visualbasic/listfragment.vb#isselectionrequired)]
